trans-unit.source: Lists the types of work performed in the work package.

seg-source.mrk: Lists the types of work performed in the work package.

target.mrk: 列出工作包中执行的工作类型。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the type of work that is performed during the delivery of a service. Work items can be used to influence pricing and billing of services.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the type of work that is performed during the delivery of a service.
Work items can be used to influence pricing and billing of services.

target.mrk: 指示服务交付期间执行的工作类型。
工作项目会影响定价和服务开票。

trans-unit.source: You use work items to plan detailed work assignments, and divide responsibility between assigned resources. You can do the following in a work package:

seg-source.mrk: You use work items to plan detailed work assignments, and divide responsibility between assigned resources.
You can do the following in a work package:

target.mrk: 使用工作项目可计划具体的工作分配，并在已分配资源之间划分责任。
可在工作包中执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: Select from a pre-defined list by searching for a work item or by using work item group as a filter to display related work items.

seg-source.mrk: Select from a pre-defined list by searching for a work item or by using work item group as a filter to display related work items.

target.mrk: 通过搜索工作项目或使用工作项目组作为过滤器来显示相关工作项目以从预定义清单中进行选择。

trans-unit.source: Key users can set up pre-defined work items and work item groups in the app <cite>Define Work Items and Groups</cite> under <menucascade><uicontrol>Manage Your Solution</uicontrol><uicontrol>Configure Your Solution</uicontrol><uicontrol>Professional Services</uicontrol></menucascade>.

seg-source.mrk: Key users can set up pre-defined work items and work item groups in the app <cite>Define Work Items and Groups</cite> under <menucascade><uicontrol>Manage Your Solution</uicontrol><uicontrol>Configure Your Solution</uicontrol><uicontrol>Professional Services</uicontrol></menucascade>.

target.mrk: 关键用户可以在<menucascade><uicontrol>管理解决方案</uicontrol><uicontrol>配置解决方案</uicontrol><uicontrol>专业服务</uicontrol></menucascade>下的<cite>定义工作项目和组</cite>应用中设置预定义的工作项目和工作项目组。
创建用户定义的工作项目。

trans-unit.source: View work items assigned to the work package.

seg-source.mrk: View work items assigned to the work package.

target.mrk: 查看分配到工作包的工作项目。

trans-unit.source: Delete or deactivate a work item from a work package, by deselecting the checkbox in the edit mode.

seg-source.mrk: Delete or deactivate a work item from a work package, by deselecting the checkbox in the edit mode.

target.mrk: 通过取消选中编辑模式中的复选框，删除或取消激活工作包中的工作项目。

trans-unit.source: The work item is deleted from the work package if it is not assigned to a resource and no actual postings exist. If the work item is assigned to a resource or if actual postings exist, the work item becomes inactive and further time recording is not possible.

seg-source.mrk: The work item is deleted from the work package if it is not assigned to a resource and no actual postings exist.
If the work item is assigned to a resource or if actual postings exist, the work item becomes inactive and further time recording is not possible.

target.mrk: 如果没有将工作项目分配到资源且不存在实际过账，则该工作项目将从工作包中删除。
如果将工作项目分配到资源或存在实际过账，则该工作项目将变为非活动状态且无法进行更多时间记录。

trans-unit.source: Activate a work item to allow assignments to resources and time recording.

seg-source.mrk: Activate a work item to allow assignments to resources and time recording.

target.mrk: 激活工作项目以允许分配到资源和时间记录。
